author: Mike Allen, Sara Fischer
title: Scoop: CNN to dull its liberal edge
description: Ratings are secondary to credibility, in the view of David Zaslav.
content:
Under new chief Chris Licht, CNN will dial down the prime-time partisanship and double down on the network's news-gathering muscle, top sources tell me.
